pages.text: Oxen are large, stout male cattle that can carry saddlebags and be saddled. Oxen can hold far more than a horse, but they’re pretty slow and can’t be armored or carpeted. There’s a 1-in-5 chance to breed an Ox with two parent cows. Oxen can be killed for even more meat than cows.

pages.name: The Ox
pages.text: A brown ox. Oxen cannot have markings.
